channel.title: Hosting on Ezekiel Haggart
channel.description: Recent content in Hosting on Ezekiel Haggart

item.title: Using Github pages to host personal site
item.description: I have decided to take advantage of GITHUB’s free static hosting and I have moved my personal site ezekiel.nz to git hosting from my droplet. I will use Rstudios free hosting for my shiny apps and host the rendered graphs/docs/etc from ezekiel/widgets.
